customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I'm not familiar with this game, but with you here, this should be worth the time spent."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Xiao's deck is centered around switching characters and Normal Attacks, using various cards to enhance his Normal Attacks' effectiveness and actively switching characters to perform Plunging Attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc:
"Frostwind Swordsman" Kaeya

Specializes in awakening knightly virtues in others.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc:
"Driving Thunder" Keqing

She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

Evil shall be dispersed, and the vile will be scattered.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

Xiao: Conqueror of Evil

Evil shall be dispersed, and the vile will be scattered.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Interesting. Perhaps if we both took this a bit more seriously, this game might be more enjoyable still..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Xiao" starts with the Talent Card "Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Yaksha's Mask</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Yaksha's Mask</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , and they will deal +1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached uses a Plunging Attack</color> : +2 additional DMG.
<color=#ffffff>If the character this card is attached to is the active character, when you perform "Switch Character"</color> : Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Plunging Attack</color>
After a character is switched in to be the Active Character, should their next Combat Action within this Round be a Normal Attack, it will be considered a Plunging Attack for the instance.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

value.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
value.desc:
Xiao: Conqueror of Evil

Evil shall be dispersed, and the vile will be scattered.

value.text: Reward for inviting Xiao to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Xiao
value.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."
